turns.utterance: i like bob ross! he was such an amazing American painter
turns.response: Did he really say "happy little trees"? Or is that more of a myth?

turns.utterance: Im not sure i know what you're talking about. He was the creator and host of "The joys of Painting"
turns.response: Yes he would paint landscapes and talk about the happy little trees lol.

turns.utterance: oh, i didn't know that. how funny :) As a child he entertained himself by caring for injured animals
turns.response: Mr. Ross seems like a good fellow, I always enjoyed how he would construct the elements of his paintings.

turns.utterance: one of his animals was featured in a few episodes
turns.response: He seemed to love the natural world, I was always amazed how a few brushstrokes would turn into a mountain lake or something.
Also he had a pretty impressive afro hairstyle too!
